__e: Jim Clark and his wife Shirley and their kids... people I've known all my life.
You, as Shirley's friend and a good guy, just saying what's really in your heart.
Maybe Shirley and I aren't right for each other.
Tonight's date is with me after all, Shirley Schmidt.
If anybody wonders how she got to be Shirley Schmidt, the evidence was on full display today.
A long time ago, I was with Shirley Schmidt, and now I'm old enough to be with her granddaughter.
Shirley, I have no idea what you are talkin' about.
Shirley, I don't know what to say other than I'm so sorry.
You grandma and grandpa came to the hospital to see you, but Shirley wouldn't let them in the door.
